internal.content: Hello and welcome on my portfolio website. I'm Peter and I've been learning front end since spring 2017. When I began studying Computer Graphic (specialization graphic designer) in 2015, I had been focused on web design skills, which I wanted to improve. Time was passing and I found a new passion - front end. Creating new websites, apps and designs is very exciting despite knowing how much I have to learn yet. I'm looking for work as (junior) front end developer mainly in Rzesz√≥w, but I'm also considering others localizations. Check my portfolio, and feel free to contact me.

Currently, I'm learning to use React (without Redux) and trying to more understand JavaScript. I have some experience with Webpack, Jekyll, Vue, React, Firebase, Gulp, JavaScript ES6+. As a graphic designer, I can handle programs like Photoshop, Illustrator, Adobe Xd, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Lightroom.

My free time is filled with activities like photography, playing the guitar, watching movies and TV series, music, sport, and video games of course. My future goals are learning how to swim and if I survive it, I would try to learn to play tennis and... there is one more thing (or two), but it's a secret for now.
